TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AmbientAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AmbientAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AmbientAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定应将某个属性或类型视为环境。

span.span: Specifies that a property or type should be treated as ambient.

summary.span: 环境概念涉及 XAML 处理器如何确定成员的类型所有者。

span.span: The ambient concept relates to how XAML processors determine type owners of members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境属性是一个属性, 当创建对象图时, 此值应在分析器上下文中可用, 但在此情况下, 由于正在创建的直接 XAML 节点的目的, 典型的类型成员查找将被挂起。An ambient property is a property where the value is expected to be available in the parser context when creating an object graph, but where typical type-member lookup is suspended for purposes of the immediate XAML node set being created. 环境概念有两个主要方案:There are two main scenarios for the ambient concept: - 同一对象的某些其他属性会影响和限定对象属性查找的工作方式。Some other property of the same object influences and qualifies how that object-property lookup should work. - 属性表示更大的延迟机制, 查找成员值的环境功能会扩展到当前对象中包含的所有对象。The property represents a larger deferral mechanism and the ambient capabilities for looking up a member value extend to all objects contained within the current object. 此特性可应用于具有启用环境属性查找行为的预期容器的特定属性, 或可应用于类, 以在属性的所有情况下启用环境属性行为。This attribute can be applied to specific properties that have expected containers that enable an ambient property lookup behavior, or can be applied to a class to enable the ambient property behavior in all cases of that value type for a property. 还可以应用于 CLR 方法, 以支持将 XAML 可附加属性特性化为环境。 can also be applied to a CLR method, to support attributing a XAML attachable property as ambient. 这可能是必需的, 因为在 CLR 实现中, XAML 附加属性是使用`get`和`set`方法作为访问器模式实现/表示为反射的。This is potentially necessary because in a CLR implementation a XAML attached property is implemented/represented to reflection as an accessor pattern with `get` and `set` methods. 不存在到属性的实际 CLR 属性, 因此将的使用`Property`限制为不会启用将可附加成员指定为环境。No actual CLR property to attribute exists, so restricting usage for to `Property` would not have enabled specifying an attachable member as ambient. 对于想要报告为环境的可附加成员, 请为`get`访问器提供属性。For an attachable member that you want to report as ambient, attribute the `get` accessor. 不应尝试将不是专门支持可附加成员的方法的属性方法。You should not attempt to attribute methods that are not specifically support methods of attachable members. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中, 此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中 , 为 system.exception 程序集。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). 环境类型 (在类型级别应用的类型) 可用于某些 XAML 处理情况, 其中属性的类型需要按顺序解析。Ambient types (types where is applied at type level) can be used for certain XAML processing situations where the type of a property needs to be resolved out of order. ## 对象编写器方案Object Writer Scenarios 如果要定义 XAML 对象编写器, 并且遇到应用的属性、方法或类型 , 通常必须访问服务以确定写出对象所需的环境属性查找行为。If you are defining a XAML object writer, and you encounter a property, method or type where is applied, you typically must access a service to determine the intended ambient property lookup behavior that is needed for writing out objects. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . ## 值转换器Value Converters 类型转换器或标记扩展可能需要了解环境信息才能处理表示间接类型映射的属性, 例如通过或不限定的字符串名称指定成员或类型的属性。Type converters or markup extensions might need to know the ambient information in order to process properties that represent indirect type mappings, such as properties that specify members or types by string names with or without qualification. 在这种情况下, 不应直接用于值转换器代码逻辑。In this scenario, is not intended to be used directly for value converter code logic. 相反, 值转换器应依赖于 XAML 编写器处理行为, 当调用时, 它会将其服务上下文传入到值转换器方法。Rather, the value converter should rely on the XAML writer processing behavior, which will pass in its service contexts to your value converter methods when called. ## AmbientAttribute 的 WPF 方案WPF Scenarios for AmbientAttribute - ( ) 的属性可以限定查找值中属性名称的支持引用所需的必要属性名称查找。A property of a () can qualify the necessary property name lookups that are needed to find the backing references for property names in values. - 属性 ( `Resources` 的项) 和模板内容中的所有内容都应该能够作为值访问其他对等方。All content within a `Resources` property (items of a ) as well as template content, should be able to access other peers as values. 将整个`Resources`属性声明为环境将调用在 WPF XAML 分析器中启用此功能的逻辑。Declaring the entire `Resources` property as ambient invokes logic that enables this in the WPF XAML parser. 有关在类型级别设置的方案的示例, 请参阅。See for an example of a scenario for setting at type level.
